short_summary: Measurement Canada seeks printers able to supply inspection and examination stickers for various devices.
description: The stickers must withstand extreme heat and cold, sunlight, as well as wet and dry conditions while remaining affixed to the device and legible
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Title (English and French)
U6309-244043B Measurement Canada inspection and examination stickers
Autocollants d'inspection et d'examen de Mesures Canada

### Reference Number
WS4142865156-Doc4289361632

### Solicitation Number
WS4142865156

### Publication Date
2023-11-02

### Tender Closing Date
2023-11-08T14:00:00 (Expired)

### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-11-13

### Government Contract Details
* Procurement Category: Service
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None

### Required Service
Measurement Canada is seeking a printer to supply inspection and examination stickers for various measuring devices, including scales, gas pumps, electricity and natural gas meters, etc.

### Specifications
* The stickers must be applied to devices in high-traffic, visible areas, both indoors and outdoors.
* The stickers must withstand extreme heat and cold temperatures, sunlight, and wet and dry conditions while remaining affixed to the device and legible.

### Contact Information
* Niall MacConaill, SPAC/PSPC
* Phone: None
* Email: [niall.macconaill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:niall.macconaill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Important Notes
All interested suppliers must submit their proposals by 14:00 on 2023-11-08. Late submissions will not be considered. The deadline for this tender announcement has expired.
